FbCloseDialog (FB)
FbCloseDialog (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK FbCloseDialog EXTENDS FbExecuteSingleVisuActionBase
Handles the action close dialog
To use this function block in the programm set the according inputvalues
and start the dialog close action with
xExecute
=
TRUE
.
The fb-instance should be declarated within a permanent setting, e.g. a GVL, and not within a temporary setting, e.g. a function.
Therefore, the action will still be available, when called, later on.
